p: The O1 atom of the hydroxyl group, which belongs to thymol, forms a H-bond interaction with Ser203 at a distance of 3.14 Å. In contrast, thymol acetate forms two H-bond interactions with the Ser203 residue. The interactions with oxygen atom O2 of the Ser203 residue have distances of 2.66 and 2.98 Å.
